paragraphs.body: Lang is a two-time Emmy Award-winning American voice actor, producer and entrepreneur. He is the co-founder of The Love Planet Foundation, a non-profit organization that creates educational materials for children on the importance of recycling, world water awareness, and the preservation of the planet. He is also the co-founder of H2Om: Water with Intention.
paragraphs.text: Lang is a two-time Emmy Award-winning American voice actor, producer and entrepreneur. He is the co-founder of The Love Planet Foundation, a non-profit organization that creates educational materials for children on the importance of recycling, world water awareness, and the preservation of the planet. He is also the co-founder of H2Om: Water with Intention.

paragraphs.body: Lang has worked as a voice director for clients including Cartoon Network, EWAM, Sony, Bang Zoom! Entertainment, Technicolor, PCB productions, Microsoft, Xbox 360, Code Masters, HBO, and Warner Brothers.
paragraphs.text: Lang has worked as a voice director for clients including Cartoon Network, EWAM, Sony, Bang Zoom! Entertainment, Technicolor, PCB productions, Microsoft, Xbox 360, Code Masters, HBO, and Warner Brothers.

paragraphs.body: Lang is a two-time Emmy Award-winning voice actor, first for his portrayal of Professor Bedhety in the 2003-2004 season of Tutenstein, and again as The Doorman and his dog Hundley on the 2009-2010 season of Curious George. He has been in hundreds of productions ranging from original animation, anime, video games, and movie trailers.
paragraphs.text: Lang is a two-time Emmy Award-winning voice actor, first for his portrayal of Professor Bedhety in the 2003-2004 season of Tutenstein, and again as The Doorman and his dog Hundley on the 2009-2010 season of Curious George. He has been in hundreds of productions ranging from original animation, anime, video games, and movie trailers.

paragraphs.body: He is known for voicing characters for Lucas Arts, Crash Twinsanity, Crash Tag Team Racing, Crash of the Titans and Crash: Mind over Mutant, replacing ${link_0} for Doctor Neo Cortex, Batman: The Brave and the Bold, Power Rangers: In Space, Power Rangers: Wild Force, Justice League Unlimited, and the Twisted Metal series. He was the announcer and celebrity voice matcher in Martin Short's talk show Primetime Glick. He reprises his role as Dr. Cortex in Skylanders: Imaginators and the upcoming Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy.
paragraphs.text: He is known for voicing characters for Lucas Arts, Crash Twinsanity, Crash Tag Team Racing, Crash of the Titans and Crash: Mind over Mutant, replacing Clancy Brown for Doctor Neo Cortex, Batman: The Brave and the Bold, Power Rangers: In Space, Power Rangers: Wild Force, Justice League Unlimited, and the Twisted Metal series. He was the announcer and celebrity voice matcher in Martin Short's talk show Primetime Glick. He reprises his role as Dr. Cortex in Skylanders: Imaginators and the upcoming Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy.

paragraphs.body: He is a singer, composer, and guitarist in his band, LeXLang. He also has a band with fellow voice actor and close friend Bentley Mitchum named The Velvet Box. He is married to voice actress Sandy Fox, and together they perform in an acoustic duo called Butterfly.
paragraphs.text: He is a singer, composer, and guitarist in his band, LeXLang. He also has a band with fellow voice actor and close friend Bentley Mitchum named The Velvet Box. He is married to voice actress Sandy Fox, and together they perform in an acoustic duo called Butterfly.

paragraphs.body: He has been a special media guest at many large science fiction and anime conventions throughout the United States and has voiced central characters in hundreds of Xbox, PlayStation, Wii, and PC video games.
